Package Model

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.GameObject
      • Model.Character
        • Model.Enemy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Boss, DPS, Flier, ShieldPillar, Tank
    public abstract class Enemy
extends Character
    Abstract class for enemies. Provides methods and fields that all types of enemies will need
    Author:
    Wes Rodgers
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Item> getDrops()

        Returns:
        a HashMap mapping the item as a key and a float representing drop chance as the value

      • active

        public boolean active()
        returns whether the enemy is active
        Returns:
        true when the enemy needs to chase after the player, false otherwise

        sets the enemy to either be active or inactive based on the passed in boolean

        b - true if the enemy needs to be active, false otherwise

      • willFlee

        public boolean willFlee()
        returns true if the enemy is a scaredy cat, false otherwise
        Returns:
        true if the enemy will flee under certain circumstances, false otherwise

      • didLootDrop
